data.title: Data Protection Platform
data.meta_description: IBM Spectrum Protect (Tivoli Storage Manager) is a data protection platform that gives enterprises a single point of control and administration for backup and recovery. The IBM experts at ITS can help implement Tivoli to protect your data. ITS is an IBM Premier Business Partner.
data.text:
Tivoli Storage Manager is a data protection platform that gives enterprises a single point of control and administration for backup and recovery. It is the flagship product in the IBM Spectrum Protect (Tivoli Storage Manager) family.

It enables reliable, cost effective backups and fast recovery for virtual, physical and cloud environments of all sizes.
